blogPost.excerpt: DrillRoom introduces AI for interactive pocket billiards training. Practice your fundamentals with the assistance of a virtual coach. Get real time feedback. Know your stats and track your progress over time. Level Up your game!
blogPost.body: DrillRoom introduces AI for interactive pocket billiards training. Practice your fundamentals with the assistance of a virtual coach. Get real time feedback. Know your stats and track your progress over time. Level Up your game!
blogPost.title: DrillRoom - AI-powered billiard training & stats
blogPost.author: Gabriel López

localize.description: DrillRoom引入AI进行互动式口袋台球训练。在虚拟教练的协助下练习你的基本功。获得实时反馈。了解您的统计数据，并随着时间的推移跟踪您的进展。提升你的游戏水平!
localize.tagline: AI驱动的台球训练与统计

localize.description: DrillRoom引入AI進行互動式口袋檯球訓練。在虛擬教練的協助下練習你的基本功。獲得實時反饋。瞭解您的統計數據，並隨着時間的推移跟蹤您的進展。提升你的遊戲水平!
localize.tagline: AI驅動的檯球訓練與統計

previous.title:
A Japanese billionaire is looking for eight volunteers to fly to the moon with him on Elon Musk’s spaceship: “I will pay for the entire journey," Yusaku Maezawa says.
https://t.co/eiaRSr9L3g

localize.full_text:
一位日本亿万富翁正在寻找8名志愿者，与他一起乘坐埃隆-马斯克的飞船飞向月球。"我将支付整个旅程的费用" 前泽雄策说。
https://t.co/eiaRSr9L3g

一位日本億萬富翁正在尋找8名志願者，與他一起乘坐埃隆-馬斯克的飛船飛向月球。"我將支付整個旅程的費用" 前澤雄策說。
https://t.co/eiaRSr9L3g
